cause.description:
find a lake, put the patio chairs down on the beach or deck (wichever is available) make sure it is a sunny day ,nice n hot too so you can have beers to cool down, go swimming and chill with your buddies all day. throw a joint in there too, there ya have it.
1. beer is delicious
2. sun tans are nice
3. effin relax man
cause.mission: get patio chairs and do this
cause.name: bliss
